MbpvMjEsfrO2bf0WWpWBQA.text: We came here to get rid of our massive hangover after a heavy night out in Edinburgh. The guy behind the counter loved his job so much! Even afterwards they came over and asked us how everything was. I used to eat chipotle when living in the USA but barburrito is way better!!

photos.caption: Photo of Barburrito - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

s9Dtco39CstY8AnfcnOebA.text: Terrible food. Paid for a quesadilla with extra cheese and nothing else. It was burned only on one side and almost no cheese. The cheese dip cup was not full. The hot salsa tastes like there is bbq sauce in it. We had to throw it away. The staff was friendly. Don't go here for decent take away food.

photos.caption: Photo of Barburrito - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

R2Sb7fSXtxaDIEb-5B_esQ.text: Is it my elitism claiming I'm from Southern California with a plethora of Mexican friends, or is this place really just that terrible (to warrant a 1 star rating)?  First off, my quesadilla. I ordered chicken (because they were out of shredded pork). It was dry as a bone, and they literally burned the tortilla, to the point that it was black. If you are unable to make a simple quesadilla, what hope do you have?  I also ordered a side of chips. The "nacho cheese" was served room temperature, and tasted of incorrectly prepared Velveeta cheese log. Stay away, Scots and tourists. This is the first time I have ever longed for the "good taste" of "Mexican" fast food

NfYvFT__UWrn-VSGTH7jDQ.text: A Scottish version of Chipotle in US?  Great service. Great guacamole. Flavors just ok to me but I have Chipotle bias.

B_9weJ5vOshDJB56PbccIw.text: Good Mexican food for being in Scotland. Similar to chipotle but with a few variations.  I really enjoyed find a place with lots of seating, vegetables and quick food service. It was perfect for the end of my visit to the city when I got tires of eating every meal in a sit down restaurant that would take 2hrs per meal. It was quick and good and the first thing with any spice in it during my entire trip to Scotland.
